input_args.text: 'Iraqi forces continue to advance on Mosul Thu Oct 27, 2016 2:49AM \nAli MusawiPress TV, Mosul \nThe Iraqi army and Kurdish Peshmerga forces continue to make advances on different fronts in the battle for Mosul. The strategic Iraqi city is now within the reach of Iraq’s elite counter terrorism units. Press TV’s Ali Musawi has more on the 10th day of the battle to retake Mosul from Daesh Takfiri terrorists. Loading ...'
